masterGrammar.rule: rule {PP option 0 - no modifiers} PP = P' <PP head> = <P' head> <PP option> = 0
rule {PP option 1a - degree word before} PP = Deg P' <PP head> = <P' head> <Deg head type modifies_PP> = + <PP option> = 1a
rule {PP option 1b - degree word after} PP = P' Deg <PP head> = <P' head> <Deg head type modifies_PP> = + <PP option> = 1b

rule {PP option 1c - degree word both sides} PP = Deg_1 P' Deg_2 <PP head> = <P' head> <Deg_1 head type modifies_PP> = + <Deg_1 head type PP-initial> = + <Deg_2 head type modifies_PP> = + <Deg_2 head type PP-final> = + <PP option> = 1c
rule {PP option 2a - adverbial before} PP = AdvP P' <PP head> = <P' head> <AdvP head type manner> = + <PP option> = 2a
rule {PP option 2b - adverbial after} PP = P' AdvP <PP head> = <P' head> <AdvP head type manner> = + <PP option> = 2b
rule {PP option 2c - adverbial both sides} PP = AdvP_1 P' AdvP_2 <PP head> = <P' head> <AdvP_1 head type manner> = + <AdvP_2 head type manner> = + <PP option> = 2c
rule {PP option 3a - ordinal before} PP = AdjP P' <PP head> = <P' head> <AdjP head type ordinal> = + <PP option> = 3a
rule {PP option 3b - ordinal after} PP = P' AdjP <PP head> = <P' head> <AdjP head type ordinal> = + <PP option> = 3b

rule {PP option 3c - ordinal both sides} PP = AdjP_1 P' AdjP_2 <PP head> = <P' head> <AdjP_1 head type ordinal> = + <AdjP_1 head type PP-initial> = + <AdjP_2 head type ordinal> = + <AdjP_2 head type PP-final> = + <PP option> = 3c

rule {PP option 4a - degree word or adverbial both sides} PP = {Deg_1 / AdvP_1} P' {Deg_2 / AdvP_2} <PP head> = <P' head> <Deg_1 head type modifies_PP> = + <Deg_1 head type PP-initial> = + <AdvP_1 head type manner> = + <AdvP_1 head type PP-initial> = + <Deg_2 head type modifies_PP> = + <Deg_2 head type PP-initial> = + <AdvP_2 head type manner> = + <AdvP_2 head type PP-initial> = + <PP option> = 4a

rule {PP option 4b - degree word or ordinal both sides} PP = {Deg_1 / AdjP_1} P' {Deg_2 / AdjP_2} <PP head> = <P' head> <Deg_1 head type modifies_PP> = + <Deg_1 head type PP-initial> = + <AdjP_1 head type ordinal> = + <AdjP_1 head type PP-initial> = + <Deg_2 head type modifies_PP> = + <Deg_2 head type PP-initial> = + <AdjP_2 head type ordinal> = + <AdjP_2 head type PP-initial> = + <PP option> = 4b

rule {PP option 4c - ordinal or adverbial both sides} PP = {AdjP_1 / AdvP_1} P' {AdjP_2 / AdvP_2} <PP head> = <P' head> <AdjP_1 head type ordinal> = + <AdjP_1 head type PP-initial> = + <AdvP_1 head type manner> = + <AdvP_1 head type PP-initial> = + <AdjP_2 head type ordinal> = + <AdjP_2 head type PP-initial> = + <AdvP_2 head type manner> = + <AdvP_2 head type PP-initial> = + <PP option> = 4c

rule {PP option 4d - degree word or or ordinal or adverbial both sides} PP = {Deg_1 / AdjP_2 / AdvP_1} P' {Deg_2 / AdjP_2 / AdvP_2} <PP head> = <P' head> <Deg_1 head type modifies_PP> = + <Deg_1 head type PP-initial> = + <AdjP_1 head type ordinal> = + <AdjP_1 head type PP-initial> = + <AdvP_1 head type manner> = + <AdvP_1 head type PP-initial> = + <Deg_2 head type modifies_PP> = + <Deg_2 head type PP-initial> = + <AdjP_2 head type ordinal> = + <AdjP_2 head type PP-initial> = + <AdvP_2 head type manner> = + <AdvP_2 head type PP-initial> = + <PP option> = 4d

rule {PBar option 1a - prepositions, accusative DP complement} P' = P DP =

= + = accusative = - | not missing a complement = | for passive = | wh for pied-piping = - | only in no V/Aux copulars = - <= = 1a

rule {PBar option 1aA - prepositions, absolutive DP complement} P' = P DP =

= + = absolutive = + | for restricting w/ possessor = - | not missing a complement = | for passive = | wh for pied-piping = - | only in no V/Aux copulars = - <= = 1aA

rule {PBar option 1aE - prepositions, ergative DP complement} P' = P DP =

= + = ergative = + | for restricting w/ possessor = - | not missing a complement = | for passive = | wh for pied-piping = - | only in no V/Aux copulars = - <= = 1aE

rule {PBar option 1aG - prepositions, genitive DP complement} P' = P DP =

= + = genitive = + | for restricting w/ possessor = - | not missing a complement = | for passive = | wh for pied-piping = - | only in no V/Aux copulars = - <= = 1aG

rule {PBar option 1b - postpositions, accusative DP complement} P' = DP P =

= + = accusative = - | not missing a complement = | for passive = | wh for pied-piping = - | only in no V/Aux copulars = - <= = 1b

rule {PBar option 1bA - postpositions, absolutive DP complement} P' = DP P =

= + = absolutive = + | for restricting w/ possessor = - | not missing a complement = | for passive = | wh for pied-piping = - | only in no V/Aux copulars = - <= = 1bA

rule {PBar option 1bE - postpositions, ergative DP complement} P' = DP P =

= + = ergative = + | for restricting w/ possessor = - | not missing a complement = | for passive = | wh for pied-piping = - | only in no V/Aux copulars = - <= = 1bE

rule {PBar option 1bG - postpositions, genitive DP complement} P' = DP P =

= + = genitive = + | for restricting w/ possessor = - | not missing a complement = | for passive = | wh for pied-piping = - | only in no V/Aux copulars = - <= = 1bG

rule {PBar option 2a - prepositions, locative AdvP complement} P' = P AdvP =

= + = + = - | not missing a complement <= = 2a

rule {PBar option 2b - postpositions, locative AdvP complement} P' = AdvP P =

= + = + = - | not missing a complement <= = 2b

rule {PBar option 3a - prepositions, locative PP complement} P' = P PP =

= +

= + = + = - | not missing a complement <= = 3a

rule {PBar option 3b - postpositions, locative PP complement} P' = PP P =

= +

= + = + = - | not missing a complement <= = 3b

rule {PBar option 4a - prepositions, IP complement } P' = P IP =

= + = - = - = - = - | not missing a complement = +

= + | assuming only temporals take IPs = 4a

rule {PBar option 4b - postpositions, IP complement} P' = IP P =

= + = - = - = - = - | not missing a complement = +

= + | assuming only temporals take IPs = 4b

rule {PBar option 5 - prepositions or postpositions with no complement} P' = P =

= + | missing a complement = 5
rule {PBar option 5a - P_prefix} P' = DP <P' head> = <DP head> <DP head type prefix P> = + <P' head type stranded> = - <PBar option> = 5a
rule {PBar option 5b - P_suffix} P' = DP <P' head> = <DP head> <DP head type suffix P> = + <P' head type stranded> = - <PBar option> = 5b
rule {PBar option 5aN - P_prefix on N} P' = DP <P' head> = <DP head> <DP head type P_prefix_N> = + <P' head type stranded> = - <PBar option> = 5aN

rule {PBar option 5bN - P_suffix on N} P' = DP <P' head> = <DP head> <DP head type P_suffix_N> = + <P' head type stranded> = -
|make sure that prefix/suffix P info passed up from subject and/or V |done on subject rules and head should be OK, Aux? w/in VP? <PBar option> = 5bN
rule {PBar option 6a - P_prefix, IP complement} P' = IP <P' head> = <IP head> <IP head type prefix P> = + <P' head type stranded> = - <P' head type sentential> = + <PBar option> = 6a

rule {PBar option 6b - P_suffix, IP complement} P' = IP <P' head> = <DP head> <DP head type suffix P> = + <P' head type stranded> = - <P' head type sentential> = +
<PBar option> = 6b
